resources.string: Throughout history, many have believed their destiny to depend on the position of the stars upon their birth. An idea that is today largely overlooked. One that states that through sacred mathematics, by the star\'s very positional nature at the moment of our inception into this world, we are to live and reflect a set ancient perspective of the universe on this planet. Each with its own attributes to guide the individual on their short journey throughout this world. Take this as you will. For every one on earth should have the ability to choose who they are, what to believe in, and the course that their journey should take. The contents of this app should serve only as a loose reference guide to that and nothing more.

string.name: mainscreentitle
string.b: Welcome to the Golden Scope of Heaven.
